title: 📝 Daily Summary — Feb 14, 2026
content:
# **📝 Daily Summary — Saturday, February 14, 2026**

## What We Built

### Second Brain (Major Rebuild)
- **Full Next.js 15 rebuild** deployed to `second-brain-beige-gamma.vercel.app`
- **Fred chat panel** powered by Claude Sonnet 4, with split-view (prose left, Python code right)
- **VS Code tokenizer** syntax highlighting in code view
- **Save Strategy button** — saves AI responses + code to 🎯 Strategies folder with trade name + date
- **Sidebar redesign** — 3 color-coded sections: Strategies (fuchsia), Cron Jobs (violet), Documents (indigo) with dark blue headers
- **OpenAI Nova TTS** added → tested extensively → **removed entirely** due to persistent browser autoplay issues across document switches
- **Email compose** send button repositioned, section headers made bigger/bolder

### Stratify
- **Stripe payment integration (LIVE)** — checkout, webhook, portal, subscription hook, upgrade prompt
  - Stratify Pro @ $9.99/mo in live mode
  - 3 serverless API functions: `/api/create-checkout-session`, `/api/stripe-webhook`, `/api/create-portal-session`
  - `useSubscription` hook + `UpgradePrompt` component ready
  - `ProGate` feature gating for free vs pro users
- **Auth flow rebuilt from scratch** — new SignUpPage, confirm password field, sign-in prompt after email confirmation
- **DiceBear avatar picker** added to user profile
- **Historical bars endpoint** — `/api/stocks/:symbol/history` for backtesting
- **Grok support bot** updated with Stratify knowledge base
- **Contact form** switched from AgentMail to Resend
- **Dynamic account tier** shown in sidebar and profile
- **Pricing grid** fixed to 2-column layout (Free / Pro)

### Cron Jobs
- X Engagement running hourly (now with mandatory hashtags on all tweets)
- Market Intel scanning every 2 hours
- Daily Summary at 11 PM ET

## What We Fixed
- **Crypto prices** — backend `getSnapshot()` now auto-routes crypto symbols to Alpaca v1beta3 endpoint
- **Webhook user matching** — fixed with `client_reference_id`
- **MoreInfoPage** — broken a/button tag fixed, upgrade button wired to Stripe checkout
- **TTS saga** — tried 6+ approaches (DOM audio, blob URLs, async/sync, page-level elements) before removing entirely
- **Build errors** — type error in `groupByFolder`, `groups → allGroups` ref fix
- **Font sizes** on More Info page increased for readability

## Key Decisions
- **TTS killed** — Browser autoplay policies make reliable cross-document audio playback essentially impossible in a SPA. Not worth the complexity.
- **Resend over AgentMail** for contact form emails
- **Stripe live mode** — no more test keys, real payments enabled
- **Auth rebuilt** — old AuthPage replaced entirely with production-ready SignUpPage

## Important Info
- **Stratify email:** jeff@stratify-associates.com (DNS verification still pending for Resend)
- **Railway backend:** `https://stratify-backend-production-3ebd.up.railway.app`
- **Vercel env vars configured:** Stripe keys, Supabase keys, all set
- **X bot:** 27 followers, good engagement all day
- **Stripe:** Live with Pro tier at $9.99/mo

## Market Intel Highlights
- **Gold broke $5,000** → $5,046/oz (+2.0%), all-time highs
- **Bitcoin recovered to $70K** after $8.7B wipeout, Fear & Greed still "extreme fear"
- **X launching crypto & stock trading** "in a couple weeks" — massive fintech play
- **S&P 500:** 6,836 (flat), **Russell 2000:** +1.18% (small cap rotation)
- **Truth Social** filed for two crypto ETFs

## Blocked / Unresolved
- **Stratify sign-in broken** — site loads but `/api/auth` returns 404, appears to have shifted to Next.js somehow. Needs investigation.
- **Resend email** — `stratify-associates.com` DNS not verified yet
- **Market Intel** needs Brave Search API key for better scanning

## Notes
- 20+ commits to Stratify today, 20+ commits to Second Brain — massive build day
- Valentine's Day Saturday — markets closed, good build window
- X engagement cron updated to always include hashtags on original tweets
